item.title: Blog: First Blog - Countdown!
item.description:
We are very glad to announce that we will be launched soon and take participation in vape world! So stop sucking those motherf#$%ng cancer sticks!!!

We might not the only one manufacturer of high-end vaporizer device, such as mechanical mods, atomizer (RTA/RDA), drip-tips, and other stuff accessories and supplies, but we are here ready to serve you the best.

Our Vision is to color your vaping experience, with our brand-new ideas and innovation to make vaping more safe and be the best substitution of traditional cigarette.

Our Mission is to grow smoke quitter numbers, very simple.

Quit smoking was very easy when you can find something taste better than traditional cigarettes. Problem, there is nothing taste better that traditional cigarettes. REALLY?? Have you try vaporizer? Try it 3 days, and you quit it! It was easy. - Fred Kudaya

By the way, I was watching this sexy sexy sexy girl video when writing this blog. Be sure you check it out. lol

Why should VAPEPAV???

We have 8 key factors to answer the question.

First, from Vapers to Vapers (V2V). We are very proud to say that we are vapers too. We are glad to help you to succeed quitting the cancer stick (traditional cigarette). We carried out a lot of product design variety based on our vaping experiences. And we understand what you need.

Second, we never stop learning. We are continously learning, learning and learning. We always discuss with experts and do a research ourself to find the facts of our metal materials and metal processing to produce a high-end vaporizer device. We don’t want to poison your body with metal toxic.

Third, quality is our first priority. We don’t want to disappoint our Customers who have been keep trusting and supporting us. We will keep up our spirit and passion to produce the best product quality to satisfy Customers vaping needs.

Forth, we are close to you. It means, you can easily get our support, if you are having device issue or trouble. And, you don’t need to pay a lot of shipping fees and import tax charges, the final most important we are using the same beloved IDR, so there is no currency fee!

Fifth, ofcourse because it is authentic! Make sure that you appreciate well modder’s works.

Finally, support your local modders!

item.title: Question: Why Are You Vaping?
item.description:
It is simple to answer. Because smoking is death. I struggled to quit traditional cigarette until one time I saw a vaporizer. My honest intention is not to really quit tobacco product, because our (smoker) nerves have been contaminated with nicotine (addictive substance). So I just want to pull nicotine with my safer way.

It wasn’t very simple actually. But let’s make it fast, a cigarette contains more than three thousand harmful chemicals, and two hundreds among them are carcinogenic. Vaping liquid (E-Liquid/E-Juice) contains Propylene Glycol, Vegetable Glycerine (Glycerine), Artificial Flavoring (Mostly FDA Approved), and some of them contain nicotine (Rated as 100% Toxic), and some of them contain Pure Grain Alcohol (PGA). Some study told us that those ingridients are safe to consume (ingest) and may not safe to inhale.

Do you think that those inhaled vapor substance will be more harmful than traditional cigarette?

For me, even vape liquid maybe rated as harmful, I might not see vape liquid as harmful as traditional cigarette. Simple, cigarette contains TAR that we (smoker) don’t need. Nicotine is the one and only that we (smoker) need.

  • I have gained weight more than 10 kilos since I started vaping (stop smoke).
  • I can smell and taste everything well.

Again, always keep in mind that “No Smoking, No Vaping” is the healthiest method to live. And my writing above is just a simple explaination to keep it fast. There are still many things that you should concern about Vaping Health Effect. I promise I will share my thought on my Blog about Vaping Health Effect.
